name: Contrario
long_description: Contrario is the first autonomous recruiting agency powered entirely by Al. We help companies hire top engineers faster by identifying and screening high-quality candidates. Our platform leverages proprietary AI to identify job seekers from an elite talent pool (Stanford, MIT, Palantir, OpenAI, etc.) who match your hiring needs. Our voice agents then conduct customized interviews that evaluate your candidates’ abilities to use the latest AI developer tools like Cursor and Windsurf. With Contrario, your company only interviews pre-vetted engineers that will 10x your company’s growth.
one_liner: The 1st fully autonomous AI recruiting agency
